name: M-E Text Based Adventure Game
description:
M-E is a text based game set in the world of Middle-Earth

The story is set in the 3rd age of middle earth. Just after the events of the hobbit but before the events of lord of the Rings. You are a traveling mercenary protecting a traveling merchant. You stop for the night to rest but you know its not safe

for more information or the most current version of the game, head on over to https://github.com/ModDayHippie/M-E-Text-Based-Adventure-Game
